name: HER TREES: THE PUZZLE HOUSE
description:
"HER TREES : The Puzzle House" is an unusual escape game.
There are no items to acquire,
You have to move and combine objects to solve the password.
Solve the mystery of this strange room.

"HER TREES : The Puzzle House" is the second game in the "HER TREES" series, but it's fine to start playing from this one.



features:

■​A new puzzle experience unlike any other game.
■All puzzles are intuitive; no tedious calculations or notes required.
■Access to hints and answers
■Approximate playtime: 1.5 hours

■Dark storybook-like ambiance, a surreal dreamworld
■Unique hand-drawn graphics
■Serene ambient sound

■A non-verbal game
■Since it's entirely monochrome, there are no puzzles that rely on color perception.
■No puzzles involve sound.
